descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/logofoj5rg7del.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=3][center][color=#ffff00]**********[/color]
[color=#ff0000]EWIs vivid Bridges 2k + Parallax[/color]
[color=#ffff00]********************[/color]
[color=#ff0000]my focus was on the color variation and greater realism[/color]
[color=#ff0000]of the stones with parallax mapping. 
one of my best work I 've ever done .[/color]
[color=#ff0000]looks fantastic in game. [/color]
[color=#ff0000]I hope you like it as well.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]features:[/color]
[color=#ff0000]new custom high detailed diffuse and normalmaps 2k.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]parallax maps: 256 px - 1k.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]my own edited parallax meshes are included.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]required: [/color]
[color=#ff0000]ENB and SMIM.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Install Order:[/color]
[color=#ff0000]1.: SMIM[/color]
[color=#ff0000]2.: EWIs vivid Bridges 2k - overwrite if you're asked.[/color]

[color=#ff0000]using your favorite Mod Manager or extract in your skyrim main folder.[/color]

[color=#ff0000]enjoy.
ewi65[/color]
[color=#ffff00]**********[/color]
